title: Flour Power
overview: Flour Power is a fun, stylish and playful series that is all about sharing the love and joy of baking. Step back in time with our lovely host Jessica McGovern in her retro inspired kitchen.Proving just how easy baking can be, Jessica effortlessly bakes up three delightful desserts in each episode. Whether you need a simple, delicious treat for your children's bake sale or an extravagant masterpiece for an elegant dinner party, Flour Power offers impressive recipes for every occasion.Celebrating an uncomplicated love of baking, Flour Power shows us that baking doesn't have to be perfect or complex â€“ you can mess up and it can still turn out great. Join Jessica and indulge in the whimsical dream of Flour Power, it'll be the sweetest half-hour of your day!
